name: Welcome to the demo of ability of using InterSystems IRIS in Node-RED \n \n Press small buttons on each inject nodes (on the left), to see it in action
info:
Welcome to the demo of ability of using InterSystems IRIS in Node-RED
\n
\n
Press small buttons on each inject nodes (on the left), to see it in action

name: Date to TS
TABLE
template:
CREATE TABLE "access" (
"no" INT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
"date" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT Current_Timestamp,
"room" INT NULL,
"id" INT NULL)

name: DELETE
template:
DELETE FROM "access" WHERE "no" = (
SELECT TOP 1 "no" 
FROM "access" ORDER BY "no" DESC)

name: UPDATE
template:
UPDATE "access" SET "room"='602' 
WHERE "no" = (
    SELECT top 1 "no" 
    FROM "access" 
    ORDER BY "date" DESC
)

name: SELECT
template:
SELECT TOP {{limit}} * 
FROM "access" 
ORDER BY "date" DESC

SELECT 
column_name, 
data_type, 
auto_increment, 
primary_key, 
is_nullable 

FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.columns 
WHERE String(Table_schema,'.',TABLE_NAME ) = '{{tablename}}'

name: Columns
format:
Column Name Data Type Nullable Primary Auto Increment
{{x.COLUMN_NAME}} {{x.DATA_TYPE}}
